Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) are considered the most efficient system for reversible conversion between chemical and electrical energy, thus having potential to be an attractive technology for a sustainable energy future.
Titulo: A highly efficient and durable air electrode for intermediate-temperature reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: To achieve high round-trip efficiency, highly efficient and durable air electrode materials are needed to minimize energy loss associated with oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and oxygen evolution reaction (OER).
Titulo: A highly efficient and durable air electrode for intermediate-temperature reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Here we report a bifunctional air electrode material, PrBa0.9Co1.96Nb0.04O5+delta, demonstrating outstanding electrochemical performance (e.g., achieving peak power densities of over 1.5 and 1 W cm-2, respectively, for Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 and BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta based fuel cells at 600 degrees C) while maintaining excellent stability (e.g., having a degradation rate of 40 mV per 1,000 h for H2O electrolysis cells).
Titulo: A highly efficient and durable air electrode for intermediate-temperature reversible solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The excellent property of the new electrode is attributed to the improved stability from Nb doping and the enhanced electrocatalytic activity from tuning Ba deficiency, as confirmed by experimental results and computational analysis.
Titulo: A highly efficient and durable air electrode for intermediate-temperature reversible solid oxide cells
